BBEX3.M.KZT.USD.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Kazakhstan / USD 1 = KZT ... (middle)

General: The tenge was introduced as legal tender with effect from 15 November 1993. The currency conversion from rouble to the tenge occurred at the rate of RUR 500 = KZT 1; the tenge has been the sole legal tender since 18 November 1993. Exchange rate as of 15 November 1993: USD 1 = KZT 4.70.
Source: National Bank of Kazakhstan, Almaty.

Comment on 2009-02: On 5 February 2009, the tenge was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates: 4 February 2009 USD 1 = KZT 122.32 5 February 2009 USD 1 = KZT 143.98. Calculated devaluation: 15.0%.

Comment on 2014-02: On 11 February 2014, the prevailing exchange rate band was changed from 145 - 155 tenge to 182 - 188 tenge per US dollar. We recorded the following exchange rates: 11 February 2014 USD 1 = KZT 155.56 12 February 2014 USD 1 = KZT 163.90 13 February 2014 USD 1 = KZT 184.50. Calculated using the exchange rates from 11 and 13 February 2014, the tenge was devalued by 15.7%.
